Reputation Manager Rapidus:
If you're eligible, tell me what you want.
You can enchant Top-Grade weapons and armors that are A-grade or better to be specialized for PvP. Weapons must be bestowed with special abilities... And one an item is enchanted, it can only be used by its owner.
Consider carefully before specializing an item for PvP as enchant scrolls may still be used on it. Augmenting, soul storing, attribute assigning or conversion to a Kamael weapon is not allowed. And you can't enchant R-grade armor to PvP armor. You should also know that bound armor of all grade cannot be enchanted to PvP armor.
